channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Kilmar Abrego Garcia is freed from Tennessee jail so he can rejoin family in Maryland to await trial
item.description: A jail release order from a Tennessee court requires Kilmar Abrego Garcia to travel directly to Maryland, where he’ll be in home detention.

item.title: Epstein’s former girlfriend told Justice Department she did not see Trump act in ‘inappropriate way’
Colorado judge rejects plea deal for funeral director who acknowledged abusing 191 corpses
